attributes.action: allow gurkhas who have gallantly served our country to stay in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow Gurkhas who have gallantly served our country to stay in the uk.enough said, these people give their lives for us, now lets open the country to them.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
